alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Okeechobee, northwestern Indian River, southwestern Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 8 miles north of Kissimmee Prairie Preserve, or 11 miles south of Lake Marian, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Marian, Kenansville, Blue Cypress Lake and Kissimmee Prairie Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee; Osceola
